ChangeList.Description: Added the **locale** property to the [organizationalBranding](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/organizationalBranding?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **brandings** relationship to the [organization](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/organization?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the [allowedDataLocationInfo](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/allowedDataLocationInfo?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type.
Removed the **administrativeUnits** relationship from the [directory](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/directory?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **sharedEmailDomains** relationship from the [directory](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/directory?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **hostnames** property from the [device](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/device?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **sharedEmailDomainInvitations** relationship from the [domain](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/domain?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **privateEndpointConnection** resource type.
Removed the **privateLinkResourcePolicy** resource type.
Removed the **localizations** relationship from the [organizationalBranding](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/organizationalBranding?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **organizationalBrandingLocalization** resource type.
Removed the **organizationalBrandingProperties** resource type.
Removed the **privateLinkResourcePolicies** relationship from the [policyRoot](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/policyRoot?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **branding** relationship from the [organization](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/organization?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **sharedEmailDomain** resource type.
Removed the **sharedEmailDomainInvitation** resource type.
Removed the **appMetadata** resource type.
Removed the **appMetadataEntry** resource type.
Removed the **employeeOrgData** resource type.
Removed the **defaultRedirectUri** property from the [application](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/application?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **employeeHireDate** property from the [user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **employeeOrgData** property from the [user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **employeeType** property from the [user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **oauth2PermissionGrants** relationship from the [user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **activateServicePlan** method from the [user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Changed the **permissionIds** property in the [preAuthorizedApplication](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/preAuthorizedApplication?view=graph-rest-beta) resource from optional to required.
